name: highlightjs-copy-ts
description: A simple, accessible highlightjs plugin to add a copy button to your codeblocks.

scripts.prepare: uglifyjs src/index.js -o ./dist/highlightjs-copy.min.js && uglifycss ./styles/highlightjs-copy.css > ./dist/highlightjs-copy.min.css && cp src/index.js dist/index.js && tsc && exit

author: Arron Hunt <arronjhunt@gmail.com>
